document_data.name: al-Asaf
document_data.mainbody: '''al-Asaf''', or the '''Sorrowful''', served as the cavalry of the [[efreet]] army in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Organization: This part of the army of the efreet had around 25,000 lancers and their mounts. They were not very good soldiers and most never returned from their assignments.
document_data.Activities: Members of this organization served as cavalry for the efreet.
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of al-Asaf.
